definition: variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

sentences.english: Objective To study the surgical method and effect of nerve paralysis esotropia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨神经麻痹性内斜视的手术治疗方法与效果。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the long term curative effect of surgical treatment for concomitant esotropia of children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨手术矫正小儿共同性内斜视的远期疗效。

sentences.english: Objective:To study the amount of surgery for concomitant esotropia in children.
sentences.chinese: 研究儿童共同性内斜视手术量。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the surgical optimal timing and extent for partially accommodative esotropia in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨儿童部分调节性内斜视的手术时机，手术量。

sentences.english: Objective To study the correcting regulation of accommodative refractive esotropia by the systematic treatment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨与调节有关的内斜视矫正规律。

sentences.english: ObjectivesThe study was designed to approach the surgical opportunity of partially accommodative esotropia in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨儿童部分调节性内斜视的手术时机。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of inferior oblique muscles weakening on V pattern esotropia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨下斜肌减弱术对内斜视V征治疗效果。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of muscle union in treatment of paralytic esotropia.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察肌联合术治疗麻痹性内斜视的作用。

sentences.english: Occasionally, children who have crossed eyes may need to have bifocals to help control the crossing.
sentences.chinese: 偶尔有内斜视的孩子会需要双光镜来控制内斜。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical effect of the Tropicamide Eye Drops to treat the esotropia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨采用双星明治疗共同性内斜视的临床效果。

sentences.english: To investigate the influence of concomitant esotropia on stereovision.
sentences.chinese: 探讨共同性内斜视对立体视觉的影响。

definition: ommatidium (single component of insect's compound eye)/one eye (i.e. one's left or right eye)
see 鬥雞眼|斗鸡眼[dou4 ji1 yan3]
eye floaters (moving spots in the eye's vitreous humor)
